data.name: Electro
data.description: Electro uses her rage and voltage to unleash massive damage on the Sinister Six's most vulnerable enemies.

starItems.name: Electro
starItems.description: Electro uses her rage and voltage to unleash massive damage on the Sinister Six's most vulnerable enemies.

3.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>20%</color> damage to primary target
In <color=#fff568>WAR</color>, if this character has <color=#86e619>2</color> or more <color=#fff568>SUPERIOR SIX</color> allies, reduce Speed Bar for the primary target by <color=#86e619>20%</color>

4.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>160%</color> damage.

In <color=#fff568>WAR</color>, if this character has <color=#86e619>2</color> or more <color=#fff568>SUPERIOR SIX</color> allies, reduce Speed Bar for the primary target by <color=#86e619>20%</color>.
4.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>20%</color> damage to primary target
Fill Speed Bar by <color=#86e619>10%</color>

5.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>180%</color> damage.

In <color=#fff568>WAR</color>, if this character has <color=#86e619>2</color> or more <color=#fff568>SUPERIOR SIX</color> allies, reduce Speed Bar for the primary target by <color=#86e619>20%</color>.

Fill Speed Bar by <color=#86e619>10%</color>.
5.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>30%</color> damage to primary target
Fill Speed Bar by +<color=#86e619>10%</color>

6.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>210%</color> damage.

In <color=#fff568>WAR</color>, if this character has <color=#86e619>2</color> or more <color=#fff568>SUPERIOR SIX</color> allies, reduce Speed Bar for the primary target by <color=#86e619>20%</color>.

Fill Speed Bar by <color=#86e619>20%</color>.

7.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>250%</color> damage.

In <color=#fff568>WAR</color>, if this character has <color=#86e619>2</color> or more <color=#fff568>SUPERIOR SIX</color> allies, reduce Speed Bar for the primary target by <color=#86e619>20%</color>.

Fill Speed Bar by <color=#86e619>20%</color>.

1.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>80%</color> damage.
Bonus attack primary target for <color=#86e619>40%</color> Piercing per positive effect on the target.
1.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>60%</color> damage to primary target
+<color=#86e619>20%</color> Piercing to secondary attacks

2.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>140%</color> damage.
Bonus attack primary target for <color=#86e619>60%</color> Piercing per positive effect on the target.

3.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>140%</color> damage.
Bonus attack primary target for <color=#86e619>60%</color> Piercing per positive effect on the target.

Gain +<color=#86e619>1</color> <color=#fff568>Charged</color>.
3.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>80%</color> damage to primary target
+<color=#86e619>20%</color> Piercing to secondary attacks

4.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>220%</color> damage.
Bonus attack primary target for <color=#86e619>80%</color> Piercing per positive effect on the target.

Gain +<color=#86e619>1</color> <color=#fff568>Charged</color>.
4.nextUpgrade: In <color=#fff568>WAR</color>, clear <color=#86e619>1</color> <color=#fff568>Charged</color> from primary target per positive effect on the target

5.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>220%</color> damage.
Bonus attack primary target for <color=#86e619>80%</color> Piercing per positive effect on the target.

In <color=#fff568>WAR</color>, clear <color=#86e619>1</color> <color=#fff568>Charged</color> from primary target per positive effect on the target.

Gain +<color=#86e619>1</color> <color=#fff568>Charged</color>.
5.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>80%</color> damage to primary target
+<color=#86e619>20%</color> Piercing to secondary attacks

6.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>300%</color> damage.
Bonus attack primary target for <color=#86e619>100%</color> Piercing per positive effect on the target.

In <color=#fff568>WAR</color>, clear <color=#86e619>1</color> <color=#fff568>Charged</color> from primary target per positive effect on the target.

Gain +<color=#86e619>1</color> <color=#fff568>Charged</color>.
6.nextUpgrade: If this character has <color=#86e619>2</color> or more <color=#fff568>SUPERIOR SIX</color> allies, gain an additional +<color=#86e519>2</color> <color=#fff568>Charged</color>

7.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>300%</color> damage.
Bonus Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>150%</color> Piercing per positive effect on the target.

In <color=#fff568>WAR</color>, clear <color=#86e619>1</color> <color=#fff568>Charged</color> from primary target per positive effect on the target.

Gain +<color=#86e619>1</color> <color=#fff568>Charged</color>. If this character has <color=#86e619>2</color> or more <color=#fff568>SUPERIOR SIX</color> allies, gain an additional <color=#86e519>2</color> <color=#fff568>Charged</color>.

1.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>100%</color> Piercing.
Attack all other enemies for <color=#86e619>80%</color> Piercing.

This attack cannot be counterattacked.
1.nextUpgrade:
Apply <color=#fff568>Offense Down</color> and <color=#fff568>Defense Down</color> to all enemies
This attack gains <color=#86e619>+100,000%</color> Extra Focus

2.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>100%</color> Piercing.
Attack all other enemies for <color=#86e619>80%</color> Piercing.

Apply <color=#fff568>Offense Down</color> and <color=#fff568>Defense Down</color> to all enemies.

This attack gains <color=#86e619>+100,000%</color> Extra Focus.
This attack cannot be counterattacked.

3.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>150%</color> Piercing.
Attack all other enemies for <color=#86e619>130%</color> Piercing.

Apply <color=#fff568>Offense Down</color> and <color=#fff568>Defense Down</color> to all enemies.

This attack gains <color=#86e619>+100,000%</color> Extra Focus.
This attack cannot be counterattacked.
3.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>50%</color> Piercing to primary target
Clear <color=#86e619>1</color> positive effect on each target

4.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>200%</color> Piercing.
Attack all other enemies for <color=#86e619>130%</color> Piercing.
Clear <color=#86e619>1</color> positive effect on each target.
Apply <color=#fff568>Offense Down</color> and <color=#fff568>Defense Down</color> to all enemies.

This attack gains <color=#86e619>+100,000%</color> Extra Focus.
This attack cannot be counterattacked.

5.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>250%</color> Piercing.
Attack all other enemies for <color=#86e619>180%</color> Piercing.
Clear <color=#86e619>1</color> positive effect on each target.
Apply <color=#fff568>Offense Down</color> and <color=#fff568>Defense Down</color> to all enemies.

This attack gains <color=#86e619>+100,000%</color> Extra Focus.
This attack cannot be counterattacked.
5.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>50%</color> Piercing to all enemies
Clear all positive effects on primary target
Clear <color=#86e619>2</color> positive effects on all secondary targets

6.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>300%</color> Piercing.
Attack all other enemies for <color=#86e619>230%</color> Piercing.
Clear all positive effects on the primary target. Clear <color=#86e619>2</color> positive effects on each secondary target.
Apply <color=#fff568>Offense Down</color> and <color=#fff568>Defense Down</color> to all enemies.

This attack gains <color=#86e619>+100,000%</color> Extra Focus.
This attack cannot be counterattacked.
6.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>50%</color> Piercing to all enemies
Apply <color=#fff568>Offense Down</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns
Apply <color=#fff568>Defense Down</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns

7.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>350%</color> Piercing.
Attack all other enemies for <color=#86e619>280%</color> Piercing.
Clear all positive effects on the primary target. Clear <color=#86e619>2</color> positive effects on each secondary target.
Apply <color=#fff568>Offense Down</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns and <color=#fff568>Defense Down</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns to all enemies.

This attack gains <color=#86e619>+100,000%</color> Extra Focus.
This attack cannot be counterattacked.

1.description:
On Turn, gain +<color=#86e619>1</color> <color=#fff568>Charged</color>, up to a maximum of <color=#86e619>5</color>.

At the end of any turn, if this character has <color=#86e619>5</color> or more <color=#fff568>Charged</color>, attack the most injured enemy for <color=#86e619>100%</color> damage, then lose <color=#86e619>5</color> <color=#fff568>Charged</color>.

2.description:
On Turn, gain +<color=#86e619>1</color> <color=#fff568>Charged</color>, up to a maximum of <color=#86e619>5</color>.

At the end of any turn, if this character has <color=#86e619>5</color> or more <color=#fff568>Charged</color>, attack the most injured enemy for <color=#86e619>100%</color> damage, then lose <color=#86e619>5</color> <color=#fff568>Charged</color>.

Gain +<color=#86e619>10%</color> Piercing per <color=#fff568>Charged</color>.
2.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>100%</color> damage to the most injured enemy
In <color=#fff568>WAR</color>, on ally <color=#fff568>SINISTER SIX</color> Turn, gain +<color=#86e619>1</color> <color=#fff568>Charged</color>

3.description:
On Turn, gain +<color=#86e619>1</color> <color=#fff568>Charged</color>, up to a maximum of <color=#86e619>5</color>.

In <color=#fff568>WAR</color>, on ally <color=#fff568>SINISTER SIX</color> Turn, gain +<color=#86e619>1</color> <color=#fff568>Charged</color>.

At the end of any turn, if this character has <color=#86e619>5</color> or more <color=#fff568>Charged</color>, attack the most injured enemy for <color=#86e619>200%</color> damage, then lose <color=#86e619>5</color> <color=#fff568>Charged</color>.

Gain +<color=#86e619>10%</color> Piercing per <color=#fff568>Charged</color>.
3.nextUpgrade: In <color=#fff568>WAR</color>, on ally <color=#fff568>SUPERIOR SIX</color> Turn, gain an additional +<color=#86e619>1</color> <color=#fff568>Charged</color>

4.description:
On Turn, gain +<color=#86e619>1</color> <color=#fff568>Charged</color>, up to a maximum of <color=#86e619>5</color>.

In <color=#fff568>WAR</color>, on ally <color=#fff568>SINISTER SIX</color> Turn, gain +<color=#86e619>1</color> <color=#fff568>Charged</color>, if that ally is also <color=#fff568>SUPERIOR SIX</color>, gain +<color=#86e619>2</color> <color=#fff568>Charged</color> instead.

At the end of any turn, if this character has <color=#86e619>5</color> or more <color=#fff568>Charged</color>, attack the most injured enemy for <color=#86e619>200%</color> damage, then lose <color=#86e619>5</color> <color=#fff568>Charged</color>.

Gain +<color=#86e619>10%</color> Piercing per <color=#fff568>Charged</color>.
4.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>100%</color> damage to the most injured enemy
Gain +<color=#86e619>15%</color> Piercing per <color=#fff568>Charged</color>

5.description:
On Turn, gain +<color=#86e619>1</color> <color=#fff568>Charged</color>, up to a maximum of <color=#86e619>5</color>.

In <color=#fff568>WAR</color>, on ally <color=#fff568>SINISTER SIX</color> Turn, gain +<color=#86e619>1</color> <color=#fff568>Charged</color>, if that ally is also <color=#fff568>SUPERIOR SIX</color>, gain +<color=#86e619>2</color> <color=#fff568>Charged</color> instead.

At the end of any turn, if this character has <color=#86e619>5</color> or more <color=#fff568>Charged</color>, attack the most injured enemy for <color=#86e619>300%</color> damage, then lose <color=#86e619>5</color> <color=#fff568>Charged</color>.

Gain +<color=#86e619>25%</color> Piercing per <color=#fff568>Charged</color>.
